title: Thresh + Face of the mountain
body: Thresh has a bug where when using face of the mountain the execute doesn't go off{{item:3070}} . Its damn annoying. Rito plz fix :)

replies.body:
Are you saying that when Thresh last hits them it doesnt share them? Or that he can't "execute" the minions below 200hp?

Thresh is technically ranged so he can't execute them, he has to last hit them when they are low to proc the targons.

I think he means it doesn't share the gold, cause it has happened to me a few times in the past

If not, range autos don't execute minions anymore, they changed that a while back, only melee execute now
